text: Sasaella is a genus of Japanese bamboo in the grass family.Makino, Tomitarô 1929. Journal of Japanese Botany 6: 15Koidzumi, Gen'ichi. 1941. Acta Phytotaxonomica et Geobotanica 10: 294-299Suzuki, S. 1976. A revision of the genus Sasaella Makino (Bambusaceae). (3).
